localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.title:
I just got a bagel with cream cheese for $3.50.

Unbelievable. I remember when the dollar used to mean something.
blogPost.author: Michael Batnick

localize.full_text:
我刚花3.5美元买了一个奶油芝士百吉饼。

难以置信。我记得当美元曾经有意义的时候。

我剛花3.5美元買了一個奶油芝士百吉餅。

難以置信。我記得當美元曾經有意義的時候。
